column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Amanda - Thank you for the 5-star review! We greatly appreciate it. On behalf of our entire staff
column2: we are grateful you gave us a try. Also
column3: please know that if ANY part of your meal isn't what you were expecting
column4: let your server know and he or she will make sure to accommodate you to the best of our ability. And in the case of the improperly cooked seasoned egg
column5: we would have been happy to provide your friend with another one.
